title: From WSJ.com: WSJD: Why Some ‘Fortnite’ Friends Can’t Play Together
text: By ComputerMagazine In social media moderation, what tasks can artificial intelligence handle, and which ones are best left up to humans? We talked to a few AI experts to find out the strengths and weaknesses of A.I. moderation. The post Social (Net)Work:...
